languages.text: {n}Окружающий мир плывет перед глазами, а вид бордовой жидкости вызывает легкую тошноту. Пожалуй, пить вам больше не стоит.{/n}
{n}The world around you begins to swim before your eyes, and the sight of the maroon liquid makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Окружающий мир плывет перед глазами, а вид бордовой жидкости вызывает легкую тошноту. Пожалуй, пить вам больше не стоит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The world around you swims before your eyes, and the sight of the maroon liquid makes you a little nauseous. You probably shouldn't drink any more of it.{/n}

{n}The world around you begins to swim before your eyes, and the sight of the maroon liquid makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你周围的世界开始不断旋转。光是看到这种栗色的液体，就让你胃里翻腾不已，或许你不该再喝了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you begins to swim before your eyes, and the sight of the maroon liquid makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你周围的世界开始不断旋转。光是看到这种栗色的液体，就让你胃里翻腾不已，或许你不该再喝了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}目の前の世界がぐらぐらと揺れ始め、えんじ色の液体を見た瞬間、軽い吐き気を催した。これ以上飲まないほうがいいだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you begins to swim before your eyes, and the sight of the maroon liquid makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前の世界がぐらぐらと揺れ始め、えんじ色の液体を見た瞬間、軽い吐き気を催した。これ以上飲まないほうがいいだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mundo empieza a dar vueltas a tu alrededor, y la visión del líquido de color granate te revuelve un poco el estómago. A lo mejor no deberías beber más.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you begins to swim before your eyes, and the sight of the maroon liquid makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mundo empieza a dar vueltas a tu alrededor, y la visión del líquido de color granate te revuelve un poco el estómago. A lo mejor no deberías beber más.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dünya gözlerinin önünde dönmeye başlıyor. Vişneçürüğü sıvının görüntüsü, biraz mideni bulandırıyor. Muhtemelen bu noktada içmeye son vermelisin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you begins to swim before your eyes, and the sight of the maroon liquid makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dünya gözlerinin önünde dönmeye başlıyor. Vişneçürüğü sıvının görüntüsü, biraz mideni bulandırıyor. Muhtemelen bu noktada içmeye son vermelisin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le monde commence à tanguer autour de vous, et la vue du liquide rouge sombre vous donne la nausée. Vous feriez mieux de vous abstenir d'en boire davantage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you begins to swim before your eyes, and the sight of the maroon liquid makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le monde commence à tanguer autour de vous, et la vue du liquide rouge sombre vous donne la nausée. Vous feriez mieux de vous abstenir d'en boire davantage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Welt beginnt vor deinen Augen zu verschwimmen und der Anblick der braunen Flüssigkeit weckt eine leichte Übelkeit in dir. Du solltest wohl besser nichts mehr davon trinken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world around you begins to swim before your eyes, and the sight of the maroon liquid makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}
